originalText.text: Love Small Door Vet for our new puppy. Everyone was very welcoming. Location was extremely cute. Even my Teddy was very comfortable with the Small Door staff. Definitely looking forward to our next visit.

text.text: Love Small Door Vet for our new puppy. Everyone was very welcoming. Location was extremely cute. Even my Teddy was very comfortable with the Small Door staff. Definitely looking forward to our next visit.

originalText.text: I happened to be staying in the UWS for a couple of months and my 14 y/o Boston Terrier started limping. I called Small Door Vet and was given an appointment within 24 hours of my call.  The vet and staff were absolutely amazing.  They went out of their way to provide a comprehensive evaluation of my aging dog's health in such a warm and friendly way. You are going to love Small Door Vet.

originalText.text: Our family loves Small Door UWS.  The team is kind, smart, attentive and professional.   The space is clean, modern and welcoming.  They communicate via text, phone and SD app. I highly recommend their one year puppy plan that provides 1st year of care at 50% the cost.  Walk by or give them a call.

text.text: Our family loves Small Door UWS.  The team is kind, smart, attentive and professional.   The space is clean, modern and welcoming.  They communicate via text, phone and SD app. I highly recommend their one year puppy plan that provides 1st year of care at 50% the cost.  Walk by or give them a call.

originalText.text: I cannot express enough how happy I am with Small Door Vet! They are everything I ever wanted in a vet. My dog has a chronic health condition and requires more intense attention and care than other dogs. I feel my dog is in the best hands here. During acute episodes she can be seen almost always same-day, and even if I have a small question, I get what feels like a lightning-fast response. I spent so much time with unresponsive and disorganized vets, which feels very scary when you have a sick pet. I’m so glad that I’ve found such great care! When you run a financial analysis, you’ll see Small Door’s prices are on par with other competitors in the area, though I truly feel the value I’m getting is 3x more what I pay for. I can’t recommend them enough!

originalText.text: I honestly can’t express how wonderful my experience with Small Door was at this UWS location. After having an actual nightmare experience with a vet office up in Harlem where I literally caught them in a lie & exposed that they were just trying to scam me, I was emotionally and financially completely spent. Small Door totally saved me and my precious fur baby! From start to finish with Celeste at reception and Dr Witter assessing what my cat’s best course of action was, I felt completely heard, respected and cared for. My cat received the proper treatment & bounced back to full health shortly after our visit. I can’t recommend this company and this specific team enough! 10 out of 10 recommended.
